title: Dayereh mina (1978), Dariush Mehrjui
description:
Ali and his father go from their poor neighborhood in the outskirts of the city to a hospital so that Ali's father can be treated for his sickness. However since they have no money, Ali starts to work for Dr. Sameri who deals in blood. (IMDb)
